title: Acquisition of property
context: ยง264-63 Acquisition of property. For the purposes of this part, the director of transportation may acquire for controlled-access facilities and service roads: (1) Property, as defined in chapter 101, by gift, devise, or purchase; or (2) Property by eminent domain under chapter 101. [L 1960, c 3, pt of ยง2; Supp, ยง111-46; HRS ยง264-63]
